column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Chicago is known for it's pizza and this is obviously a place for Chicagoan's.  I'm originally from the south
column2: it would take some getting used to.  My family enjoyed it and there is a popular appetizer we ordered (sorry I forgot what it was) that was truly excellent...IMO
column3: better than the pizza.  Overall if my family enjoyed it
column4: then I'm satisfied.  What are Moms for?  :)
